name: Pocket Hero 2-Tanks Battle
description:
Be careful the Reflected shells everywhere！
Exciting and swiftly battles won't give you a time for thinking!
You die or enemy die, the few seconds, after encounter!
Pick up the various weapons of the map to help you win the fight!
Hop into a tank and immerse yourself in a world of furious tank battles.


The features:
- Dozens of different terrain maps.
- Multiple enemy tanks with different abilities.
- All kinds of weapons help you to win.
- More features await your discovery.

Battle for your honor and experience epic, such as scale exciting tank games.
